mapper.select: select ${ew.sqlSelect} from t_planning_season s ${ ew.customSqlSegment} and exists (select id from t_planning_band b where b.planning_season_id = s.id and del_flag='0' and status='2')

select season, year from t_planning_season s where exists (select id from t_planning_band b where b.planning_season_id = s.id and del_flag='0' and status='2') and company_code=#{companyCode} and del_flag='0' group by season, year
